```{r }
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
```

```{r }
set.seed(101)
n <- 10

df_data <-
  tibble(x = seq(0, 1, length.out = n)) %>%
  mutate(
    y = x^2,
    y_meas = y + 0.2 * rnorm(n = n),
    y_mean = mean(y)
  )

fit_linear <-
  lm(
    data = df_data,
    formula = y_meas ~ x
  )

fit_quad <-
  lm(
    data = df_data,
    formula = y_meas ~ poly(x, degree = 2)
  )
```

```{r }
df_data %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(
    aes(x, y),
    size = 1 / 2
  ) +
  geom_segment(
    aes(x, y_meas, xend = x, yend = y),
    linetype = 1,
    size = 1,
    color = "red"
  ) +
  geom_point(
    aes(x, y_meas),
    size = 3
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1/2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1/2, 1)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "Feature",
    y = "Response"
  )
ggsave("../../fig/06_model_fit_true.png")
```

```{r }
df_data %>%
  add_predictions(fit_linear, var = "y_pred") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(
    aes(x, y),
    size = 1 / 2,
    linestyle = 2,
    color = "grey80"
  ) +
  geom_line(
    aes(x, y_pred),
    size = 1 / 2
  ) +
  geom_segment(
    aes(x, y_meas, xend = x, yend = y_pred),
    linetype = 1,
    size = 1,
    color = "red"
  ) +
  geom_point(
    aes(x, y_meas),
    size = 3
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1/2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1/2, 1)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "Feature",
    y = "Response"
  )
ggsave("../../fig/06_model_fit_linear.png")
```

```{r }
fit_poly <-
  lm(
    data = df_data,
    formula = y_meas ~ poly(x, degree = 8)
  )

df_ref <-
  tibble(x = seq(0, 1, length.out = 100)) %>%
  add_predictions(fit_poly, var = "y_pred")

df_data %>%
  add_predictions(fit_poly, var = "y_pred") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(
    aes(x, y),
    size = 1 / 2,
    linestyle = 2,
    color = "grey80"
  ) +
  geom_line(
    data = df_ref,
    aes(x, y_pred),
    size = 1 / 2
  ) +
  geom_segment(
    aes(x, y_meas, xend = x, yend = y_pred),
    linetype = 1,
    size = 1,
    color = "red"
  ) +
  geom_point(
    aes(x, y_meas),
    size = 3
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1/2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 1/2, 1)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "Feature",
    y = "Response"
  )
ggsave("../../fig/06_model_fit_overfit.png")
```
